response.job_title: |Technical Suport | Medical, Appliances and P&IA Manufacturing | Adhesive Technolgies| Sustainable and Cost Saving Initiatives
response.summary:
Ingeniero de soporte técnico con enfoque en desarrollo de aplicaciones sustentables para industria manufacturera. Desarrollando conexión con Henkel para la industria médica, línea blanca, telecomunicaciones, agrícola y de generación de energía.

Acompañando a nuestros clientes en el desarrollo de sus procesos productivos con la cantidad óptima y más adecuada de material, garantizando y cumpliendo los estándares de calidad establecidos por cada industria.
response.skills: Analytical Chemistry, Process Engineering, Polymers, Engineering, Control de Procesos, Diseño de planta, Diseño de Procesos, Aspen HYSYS, Aspen Plus, Visual Basic, Matlab, Microsoft Word, Docencia

profile_positions.description:
Technical Customer Service Engineer for Colombia and Central America for Adhesive Technoligies like Loctite and Teroson. 

Working with adhesives, protective coatings, cleaners, sealants, threadlockers, for general manufacturing and automotive industries in the production and maintenance process lines.
profile_positions.title: Technical Customer Service Engineer Adhesive Technologies

profile_positions.description: Techinical Customer Service Engineer for Colombia and Ecuador on Bonderite Surface Treatment Technologies for general industry and automotive industry like Renault, Hino and Suzuki.
profile_positions.title: Technical Customer Service Engineer Surface Treatment Technologies

profile_positions.description:
Postgraduate Research student on the Master in Chemical Engineering  in design and process control.

Design, Modelling, Control analysis, optimization, start up and automation of an emulsion polymerization reactor for PVAc production. 

Working in the analysis of the strategies for the safe operation of the process reaction.
profile_positions.title: Chemical Engineer

profile_positions.description: Determination of the binary equilibrium of Ethyl Acetate-Isoamyl Acetate in order to configure the correct operational conditions for fusel reactive distillation
profile_positions.title: Assistant Research

profile_positions.description:
Helped with the determination of dead time factors in the vinyl and acrylic paintings production. 
Worked in the development of polymerization reactions and  in the study of properties of the adhesives produced.
profile_positions.title: Production Assistant Engineer

profile_positions.description: Estudiante auxiliar de la facultad de ingeniería de la Universidad Nacional de Colombia en el proyecto de “Diseño, montaje y puesta a punto de una torre de destilación extractiva con intercambiadores secuenciales”.
profile_positions.title: Estudiante Auxiliar

profile_positions.description: Estudiante auxiliar de la facultad de ingeniería de la Universidad Nacional de Colombia como tutor de la materia “Control de Procesos”
profile_positions.title: Estudiante Auxiliar

profile_positions.description:
Estudiante en práctica en el área de investigación y desarrollo. Participación en el diseño de propuestas de sistemas de recuperación de solventes. 
Estrategias en optimización de tiempos de producción. 
Contacto con proveedores 
Diseño de nuevos productos
profile_positions.title: Ingeniero en prácticas

education.grade: Mencion meritoria por trabajo de grado

company.name: Henkel
company.description:
Henkel operates worldwide with leading innovations, brands and technologies in two business areas: Adhesive Technologies and Consumer Brands.

Founded in 1876, Henkel looks back on more than 145 years of success. The company holds leading positions with its two business units in both industrial and consumer businesses thanks to strong brands, innovations and technologies such as Persil, Schwarzkopf and Loctite. Henkel, headquartered in Düsseldorf / Germany, counts among the most internationally aligned German-based companies in the global marketplace.

Our company purpose expresses what unites us all at Henkel: Pioneers at heart for the good of generations. We are a diverse team of more than 50,000 colleagues worldwide, striving to enrich and improve life every day through our products, services, and solutions. Our Purpose is built from our roots and carries a long-standing legacy of innovation, responsibility, and sustainability into the future. Our shared values and Leadership Commitments guide our decisions and actions every day.

Imprint: http://www.henkel.com/imprint
Data Privacy: https://www.henkel.com/data-protection-statement-social-media
